‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡πÑ‡∏•‡πà‡∏•‡∏á‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏ß‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÜ‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏•‡∏∞ ‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô!

Hey! It‚Äôs nice to see you again!

I‚Äôm publicly launch a pre-alpha-beta build of my newly blog run by Hugo!

Hooray!!!

Many things need to be done. Start with re-publish all of my work, seems like I‚Äôm working in circle but it‚Äôs for the better understanding of making website and making sure I got the latest things to work with. To the brighter future!

item.title: New Year, Time to Recalibrate
item.description:
new year time to recalibrate

hey Hey HEY! It‚Äôs new year… AGAIN!? Wow. Time flies!

Snakey Year is upon us and it is time for me to recalibrate myself for a better future!

I have done this exercise that would set my course towards my goals. You can try it out yourself!

It gave me much more clearer vision on what I‚Äôm going to do next. Here is my promises that I gave myself and I want to share with you today.

item.title: After Christmas
item.description: PDF

item.title: First Blog from scratch
item.description:
After reading, watching and experimenting a lot about how to create blog using basic tools like markdown and github, I have finally arrived on my own ways to create my own blog and the repositories for my published artworks.

This could help me a lot for backup all my published work into an easy to find place with minimal crawling into media tabs or albums.

item.title: Pocky Shark
item.description:
English

Sweet Shark

He‚Äôs feeling generous

Quickly. before he changes his mind~

The Pocky Event day is now completed! Thank you for all the voters! He will be pleased for a while, until the next event approaches and I think it‚Äôs not that long.

But, until then, enjoy his sweets!

item.title: Behind the art: The Art Hoarder has been founded!
item.description:
He has been founded!

This illustration came from my first snippets of me complaining about my unfinished work that gets piled behind the scene - that might not be able to see the light. They collected over the years - decade even - so that when I‚Äôve got the courage to revisit them; It overwhelms me completely.

item.title: Who am I and Where to find me
item.description:
Youtube Link

This is sort of like a re-introductory for myself as an artist who has been lurking in the shadow for decades.

I‚Äôm ready to come out and share what I‚Äôve learned and I think it‚Äôll be both fun and insight for you guys as well!

See you around!

Where to find me

  • My Homemade website : https://www.atlastseason.art
  • Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/atlastseason.art
  • Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/atlastseason
  • Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/@atlastseason
  • Tiktok : https://www.tiktok.com/@atlastseason
  • X/Twitter : https://www.twitter.com/atlastseason
  • Tumblr : https://atlastseason.tumblr.com

item.title: Working on My Web
item.description:
Recently, I’ve been doing anything but drawing. I just don’t want to forget how. So, I drew my trusty “Green Dragon” and adding a little bit of simplify and make him even more agile!

Been struggle to know if I should be planning more or just run through what I’ve felt is best for now. I‚Äôve felt like this for the last two months.

item.title: Fuckit,imgoingbacktopaper!
item.description:
Youtube Link

And they said paper is oldschool. I say fuck them!

It‚Äôs been frustrating whole months that I didn‚Äôt draw anything substantially after I being laid off from animation industry. But tonight it will be different! I‚Äôm appeared to be at my home - where my light table was. I climbed up onto the top of my closet and bring it back to life. Thank goodness it‚Äôs still working!
